Cooking homestyle dishes, packing bento lunches

profile.en:
A member of the School Lunch Club that manages Gehenna Academy's dining hall.

A kind and earnest student, making her a bit of a rarity at Gehenna. She prepares and serves hundreds of meals every morning for the students of Gehenna. She's a good cook, but her skills are written off due to the dining hall's lack of manpower. Still, she refuses to give up and is constantly looking for ways to improve the menu.
profile.jp:
ゲヘナ学園所属、学生食堂の管理を担当する給食部のメンバー。

毎朝学園のみんなのためにすごい量の食事を作っている、ゲヘナでは珍しい、優しくて真面目な生徒。料理の腕前はそれなりに良い方だが、食堂の人手は基本的に足りてないこともあり、その実力は過小評価されがち。それでも彼女はめげることなく、より美味しい食事を提供するため日々こつこつ努力を重ねている。
profile.zh_cn_jp:
格黑娜学园所属，负责管理学生食堂的「供餐部」的成员。

每天早上为学园的学生们烹饪大量食物，在格黑娜中算是少有的温柔而老实的学生。
烹饪技术优秀，但由于食堂人手基本不够，让她的能力往往被低估。
即使这样她也没有气馁，为了提供更美味的食物日复一日孜孜不倦地努力。
profile.zh_cn_tw:
格黑娜学园所属，负责管理格黑娜学园餐厅的供给部的成员。

每天早上都为格黑娜学生准备非常大量的食物，是格黑娜少有的，善良认真的学生。
料理手艺还算不错，但由于餐厅人手不足，其料理实力时常被低估。
但她并未就此放弃，每天都为了提供更好的餐点而不断努力着。
profile.zh_cn_cn:
歌赫娜负责管理食堂的供餐部成员。

在歌赫娜，她是为数不多的认真又亲切的正常人，每天早上都会为歌赫娜的大家准备数百份早餐。
虽然厨艺还算不错，但由于食堂人手不足，无法发挥正常实力。
但她并没有因此放弃，一直在努力开发更好的食谱。

intro.en: I'm Fuuka from the School Lunch Club. Let me know if you're hungry. I'll whip something up for you.
intro.jp:
給食部のフウカです。
食べたいものがあったら、
いつでも仰ってください。
intro.zh_cn_jp:
給食部のフウカです。
食べたいものがあったら、
いつでも仰ってください。
intro.zh_cn_tw:
我是供给部的风华。
如果有什么想吃的，欢迎随时告诉我。

desc.en: 沙織的加入讓聚集在一起的奧利斯小隊也迴應了老師的召集。修女會和救護騎士團在第4聖所待機。儘管攻略第5聖所的過程中遇到了困境，但後來溫泉開發部和被釋放的小雪伸出了援手。接著第6聖所也完成了居民的避難處理。仁耶向忍術研究部轉達前往雪原搜尋百花繚亂部長的任務。
desc.jp: 沙織的加入讓聚集在一起的奧利斯小隊也迴應了老師的召集。修女會和救護騎士團在第4聖所待機。儘管攻略第5聖所的過程中遇到了困境，但後來溫泉開發部和被釋放的小雪伸出了援手。接著第6聖所也完成了居民的避難處理。仁耶向忍術研究部轉達前往雪原搜尋百花繚亂部長的任務。
desc.zh_cn: {cf沙织}的加入让聚集在一起的{cn奥利斯小队}也回应了老师的召集。{cn修女会}和{cn救护骑士团}在第4圣所待机。尽管攻略第5圣所的过程中遇到了困境，但后来{cn温泉开发部}和被释放的{cf小雪}伸出了援手。接着第6圣所也完成了居民的避难处理。仁耶向{cn忍术研究部}转达前往雪原搜索百花缭乱部长的任务。

desc.en: 奧利斯小隊也收到了老師的訊息，但日和擔心他們處於通緝狀態，這樣會給老師帶來麻煩。就在這時眾人聽到一陣奇怪的聲音。
desc.jp: 奧利斯小隊也收到了老師的訊息，但日和擔心他們處於通緝狀態，這樣會給老師帶來麻煩。就在這時眾人聽到一陣奇怪的聲音。
desc.zh_cn: {cn奥利斯小队}也收到了老师的消息，但{cf日和}担心他们处于通缉状态，这样会给老师带来麻烦。就在这时众人听到一阵奇怪的声音。

desc.en: 貝裡塔斯回報稱，由於霍德鑽進了堡壘都市地下，而那裡被莉音的系統保護著，無法探測；他們正在破譯密碼，但耗時會比較長。真紀聽後有點驚訝，但乃愛讓真紀繼續專注於第一聖所。
desc.jp: 貝裡塔斯回報稱，由於霍德鑽進了堡壘都市地下，而那裡被莉音的系統保護著，無法探測；他們正在破譯密碼，但耗時會比較長。真紀聽後有點驚訝，但乃愛讓真紀繼續專注於第一聖所。
desc.zh_cn: {cn贝里塔斯}回报称，由于霍德钻进了堡垒都市地下，而那里被{cf莉音}的系统保护着，无法探测；他们正在破译密码，但耗时会比较长。{cf真纪}听后有点惊讶，但{cf乃爱}让{cf真纪}继续专注于第一圣所。

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.jp:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.zh_cn:
蔚蓝档案OST的第十七首曲子，常在“商店”页播放，也是优香回忆大厅的主题曲。
曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。

desc.en: 陽葵突然接入通訊，表示她記得曾經有人偽造過千年的債券，而相關的系統就是由莉音設計。千尋以為是陽葵所作，但後者表示另有其人。乃愛聽後呼叫了優香，而優香讓乃愛來一趟反省室。
desc.jp: 陽葵突然接入通訊，表示她記得曾經有人偽造過千年的債券，而相關的系統就是由莉音設計。千尋以為是陽葵所作，但後者表示另有其人。乃愛聽後呼叫了優香，而優香讓乃愛來一趟反省室。
desc.zh_cn: {cf阳葵}突然接入通讯，表示她记得曾经有人伪造过{sn千年}的债券，而相关的系统就是由{cf莉音}设计。{cf千寻}以为是{cf阳葵}所作，但后者表示另有其人。{cf乃爱}听后呼叫了{cf优香}，而{cf优香}让{cf乃爱}来一趟反省室。

desc.en: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.jp: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.zh_cn: 桃香是基沃托斯学生会交通部的部长，在新手教程以及其他一些剧情中均有出现。个人性格很懒，喜欢逃避事情，还喜欢天天吃她的明太子味薯片。在当前设定下，桃香的主要任务就是把任务分配给老师做。

desc.en: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.jp: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.zh_cn: 桃香是基沃托斯学生会交通部的部长，在新手教程以及其他一些剧情中均有出现。个人性格很懒，喜欢逃避事情，还喜欢天天吃她的明太子味薯片。在当前设定下，桃香的主要任务就是把任务分配给老师做。

desc.en: 補課部的梓和日步美被安排到了在第六聖所周邊執行巡邏的任務。梓對保護日步美一事很有信心。日步美與梓約定，在戰鬥結束後，一起去看佩洛洛大人的特攝電影。
desc.jp: 補課部的梓和日步美被安排到了在第六聖所周邊執行巡邏的任務。梓對保護日步美一事很有信心。日步美與梓約定，在戰鬥結束後，一起去看佩洛洛大人的特攝電影。
desc.zh_cn: {cn补课部}的{cf梓}和{cf日步美}被安排到了在第六圣所周边执行巡逻的任务。{cf梓}对保护{cf日步美}一事很有信心。{cf日步美}与{cf梓}约定，在战斗结束后，一起去看佩洛洛大人的特摄电影。
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.jp: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.zh_cn: 桃香是基沃托斯学生会交通部的部长，在新手教程以及其他一些剧情中均有出现。个人性格很懒，喜欢逃避事情，还喜欢天天吃她的明太子味薯片。在当前设定下，桃香的主要任务就是把任务分配给老师做。

name.en: 美食研究會與風華同學
name.jp: 美食研究會與風華同學

desc.en: 琳宣佈風華同學正式負責船上的餐飲供給，同時一同到來的還有美食研究會。風華對莫名其妙來到這裡有些不滿，但美食研究會解釋稱這是為了嚐到“太空美食”――雖然這番說辭對風華而言並沒有什麼吸引力。亞伽裡同時提到為了以防萬一，他們順便還把供給部的小車也給拿上來了。眾人的期望和興致都很高。
desc.jp: 琳宣佈風華同學正式負責船上的餐飲供給，同時一同到來的還有美食研究會。風華對莫名其妙來到這裡有些不滿，但美食研究會解釋稱這是為了嚐到“太空美食”――雖然這番說辭對風華而言並沒有什麼吸引力。亞伽裡同時提到為了以防萬一，他們順便還把供給部的小車也給拿上來了。眾人的期望和興致都很高。
desc.zh_cn: {cf琳}宣布{cf风华}同学正式负责船上的餐饮供给，同时一同到来的还有{cn美食研究会}。{cf风华}对莫名其妙来到这里有些不满，但{cn美食研究会}解释称这是为了尝到“太空美食”――虽然这番说辞对{cf风华}而言并没有什么吸引力。{cf亚伽里}同时提到为了以防万一，他们顺便还把{cn供给部}的小车也给拿上来了。众人的期望和兴致都很高。

desc.en: Arona is the system manager of the Shittim Chest in Blue Archive, who is set to be a personal assistant for Sensei. She is overall blue, recalling the game title Blue Archive. Though being cute, Arona seldom brings Sensei a 3-star student when recruiting, which is unknown for being either accidentally or intentionally. In Chinese (Traditional) translation, Arona is called "彩奈", with the "彩" (rainbow) indicating the color of the letter for a 3-star student; from some aspects, it might be an intensional case for wishing more 3-star students.
desc.jp: Arona is the system manager of the Shittim Chest in Blue Archive, who is set to be a personal assistant for Sensei. She is overall blue, recalling the game title Blue Archive. Though being cute, Arona seldom brings Sensei a 3-star student when recruiting, which is unknown for being either accidentally or intentionally. In Chinese (Traditional) translation, Arona is called "彩奈", with the "彩" (rainbow) indicating the color of the letter for a 3-star student; from some aspects, it might be an intensional case for wishing more 3-star students.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 阿罗娜(Arona)是蔚蓝档案中的“什锦之箱”中的系统管理员，设定上是一个辅助老师的个人小助理。阿罗娜的整体色调是蓝色，与游戏名称“蔚蓝/碧蓝档案”相呼应。尽管长得很可爱，阿罗娜在帮助老师招募学生时却经常会不出三星，具体是故意还是不小心的就不得人知了。国际服繁中将其称呼为“彩奈”，某种层面上看可能是在希望阿罗娜能够多出点彩（bushi）。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 彩奈(英文名 Arona 直译为 阿罗娜)是蔚蓝档案中的“什锦之箱”中的系统管理员，设定上是一个辅助老师的个人小助理。彩奈的整体色调是蓝色，与游戏名称“蔚蓝/碧蓝档案”相呼应。尽管长得很可爱，彩奈在帮助老师招募学生时却经常会不出三星，具体是故意还是不小心的就不得人知了。从某种层面上看，繁中有意在其名字中加入“彩”一字，大概也是寄托着出彩的希望（bushi）。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 彩奈(英文名 Arona 直译为 阿罗娜)是蔚蓝档案中的“什锦之箱”中的系统管理员，设定上是一个辅助老师的个人小助理。彩奈的整体色调是蓝色，与游戏名称“蔚蓝/碧蓝档案”相呼应。尽管长得很可爱，彩奈在帮助老师招募学生时却经常会不出三星，具体是故意还是不小心的就不得人知了。从某种层面上看，繁中有意在其名字中加入“彩”一字，大概也是寄托着出彩的希望（bushi）。

desc.en: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.

desc.en: Arona is the system manager of the Shittim Chest in Blue Archive, who is set to be a personal assistant for Sensei. She is overall blue, recalling the game title Blue Archive. Though being cute, Arona seldom brings Sensei a 3-star student when recruiting, which is unknown for being either accidentally or intentionally. In Chinese (Traditional) translation, Arona is called "彩奈", with the "彩" (rainbow) indicating the color of the letter for a 3-star student; from some aspects, it might be an intensional case for wishing more 3-star students.
desc.jp: Arona is the system manager of the Shittim Chest in Blue Archive, who is set to be a personal assistant for Sensei. She is overall blue, recalling the game title Blue Archive. Though being cute, Arona seldom brings Sensei a 3-star student when recruiting, which is unknown for being either accidentally or intentionally. In Chinese (Traditional) translation, Arona is called "彩奈", with the "彩" (rainbow) indicating the color of the letter for a 3-star student; from some aspects, it might be an intensional case for wishing more 3-star students.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 阿罗娜(Arona)是蔚蓝档案中的“什锦之箱”中的系统管理员，设定上是一个辅助老师的个人小助理。阿罗娜的整体色调是蓝色，与游戏名称“蔚蓝/碧蓝档案”相呼应。尽管长得很可爱，阿罗娜在帮助老师招募学生时却经常会不出三星，具体是故意还是不小心的就不得人知了。国际服繁中将其称呼为“彩奈”，某种层面上看可能是在希望阿罗娜能够多出点彩（bushi）。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 彩奈(英文名 Arona 直译为 阿罗娜)是蔚蓝档案中的“什锦之箱”中的系统管理员，设定上是一个辅助老师的个人小助理。彩奈的整体色调是蓝色，与游戏名称“蔚蓝/碧蓝档案”相呼应。尽管长得很可爱，彩奈在帮助老师招募学生时却经常会不出三星，具体是故意还是不小心的就不得人知了。从某种层面上看，繁中有意在其名字中加入“彩”一字，大概也是寄托着出彩的希望（bushi）。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 彩奈(英文名 Arona 直译为 阿罗娜)是蔚蓝档案中的“什锦之箱”中的系统管理员，设定上是一个辅助老师的个人小助理。彩奈的整体色调是蓝色，与游戏名称“蔚蓝/碧蓝档案”相呼应。尽管长得很可爱，彩奈在帮助老师招募学生时却经常会不出三星，具体是故意还是不小心的就不得人知了。从某种层面上看，繁中有意在其名字中加入“彩”一字，大概也是寄托着出彩的希望（bushi）。

desc.en: 黑服在與老師的交流中提到，即便老師這麼去做了，命運的歸宿最終仍會讓基沃託斯到達終結，就像白子那一般。黑服無法理解老師為何在一個命運已經決定的世界裡奮力掙扎到這種地步。
desc.jp: 黑服在與老師的交流中提到，即便老師這麼去做了，命運的歸宿最終仍會讓基沃託斯到達終結，就像白子那一般。黑服無法理解老師為何在一個命運已經決定的世界裡奮力掙扎到這種地步。
desc.zh_cn: 黑服在与老师的交流中提到，即便老师这么去做了，命运的归宿最终仍会让基沃托斯到达终结，就像{cf白子}那一般。黑服无法理解老师为何在一个命运已经决定的世界里奋力挣扎到这种地步。

name.en: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.jp: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.zh_cn: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)

desc.en: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.
desc.jp: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.
desc.zh_cn: 黑色西服人是蔚蓝档案中的反派角色，隶属于组织“数秘会”。其主要目标是研究基沃托斯中的神秘，以及利用“十字神明”AI的力量。在多个故事中均有出现。

desc.en: 老師對彩奈問題的回答是――這是作為大人的責任。
desc.jp: 老師對彩奈問題的回答是――這是作為大人的責任。
desc.zh_cn: 老师对{cf彩奈}问题的回答是――这是作为大人的责任。

desc.en: 黑服追問老師他是否是真的會不惜一切代價，老師堅定的回答了“是”。
desc.jp: 黑服追問老師他是否是真的會不惜一切代價，老師堅定的回答了“是”。
desc.zh_cn: 黑服追问老师他是否是真的会不惜一切代价，老师坚定的回答了“是”。

desc.en: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.
desc.jp: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.
desc.zh_cn: 黑色西服人是蔚蓝档案中的反派角色，隶属于组织“数秘会”。其主要目标是研究基沃托斯中的神秘，以及利用“十字神明”AI的力量。在多个故事中均有出现。

desc.en: 老師內心做著激烈的鬥爭，琳把老師拉回現實。老師詢問琳當時是如何回答會長關於“第二項古則”的問題的――更準確的來說，琳是如何填空的。
desc.jp: 老師內心做著激烈的鬥爭，琳把老師拉回現實。老師詢問琳當時是如何回答會長關於“第二項古則”的問題的――更準確的來說，琳是如何填空的。
desc.zh_cn: 老师内心做着激烈的斗争，{cf琳}把老师拉回现实。老师询问{cf琳}当时是如何回答会长关于“第二项古则”的问题的――更准确的来说，{cf琳}是如何填空的。

desc.en: Rin is the Vice President of the General Student Council. She appears in the Tutorial and Volume Final.
desc.jp: Rin is the Vice President of the General Student Council. She appears in the Tutorial and Volume Final.
desc.zh_cn: 琳是联邦学生会的副会长，在新手教程以及终章中出现过。

desc.en: 會長相信，琳與她之間無法互相理解、無法觸及彼此而只能走在各自的道路上，是一種天意。會長很喜歡琳完成的句子：透過無法理解的他人（事物），是否能夠理解自己（彼此）呢？
desc.jp: 會長相信，琳與她之間無法互相理解、無法觸及彼此而只能走在各自的道路上，是一種天意。會長很喜歡琳完成的句子：透過無法理解的他人（事物），是否能夠理解自己（彼此）呢？
desc.zh_cn: 会长相信，{cf琳}与她之间无法互相理解、无法触及彼此而只能走在各自的道路上，是一种天意。会长很喜欢{cf琳}完成的句子：通过无法理解的他人（事物），是否能够理解自己（彼此）呢？

name.en: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.jp: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.zh_cn: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)

desc.en: 利用箱子的力量，老師成功啟動了戰艦，一切都在按照手冊和計劃上的執行著。老師下令戰艦正式啟航，綾音報告戰艦準備離地。
desc.jp: 利用箱子的力量，老師成功啟動了戰艦，一切都在按照手冊和計劃上的執行著。老師下令戰艦正式啟航，綾音報告戰艦準備離地。
desc.zh_cn: 利用箱子的力量，老师成功启动了战舰，一切都在按照手册和计划上的执行着。老师下令战舰正式启航，{cf绫音}报告战舰准备离地。

desc.en: Ayumu is a member of the General Student Council.
desc.jp: Ayumu is a member of the General Student Council.
desc.zh_cn: 步是联邦学生会的一名成员。

desc.en: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.jp: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.zh_cn: 桃香是基沃托斯学生会交通部的部长，在新手教程以及其他一些剧情中均有出现。个人性格很懒，喜欢逃避事情，还喜欢天天吃她的明太子味薯片。在当前设定下，桃香的主要任务就是把任务分配给老师做。

desc.en: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.jp: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.zh_cn: 有些时候，停下来饮杯茶也不错。举例/联想：Cherry Merry Berry

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。

name.zh_cn: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.jp:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.zh_cn:
蔚蓝档案OST的第十七首曲子，常在“商店”页播放，也是优香回忆大厅的主题曲。
曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。

desc.en: 雖然成功進入了，但生命守護者在瞬間被方舟內部的敵人團團包圍住了。船內的學生立刻衝出來，展開保護船隻的防禦戰。
desc.jp: 雖然成功進入了，但生命守護者在瞬間被方舟內部的敵人團團包圍住了。船內的學生立刻衝出來，展開保護船隻的防禦戰。
desc.zh_cn: 虽然成功进入了，但生命守护者在瞬间被方舟内部的敌人团团包围住了。船内的学生立刻冲出来，展开保护船只的防御战。

desc.en: 雖然眾人都沒什麼事，但是陽葵等人報告稱方舟損壞嚴重，不僅動力系統失效，通訊和運算模組也受到了不小的影響。
desc.jp: 雖然眾人都沒什麼事，但是陽葵等人報告稱方舟損壞嚴重，不僅動力系統失效，通訊和運算模組也受到了不小的影響。
desc.zh_cn: 虽然众人都没什么事，但是{cf阳葵}等人报告称方舟损坏严重，不仅动力系统失效，通讯和运算模块也受到了不小的影响。
举例/联想：Let me think about it

desc.en: Get ready for combat!Example: Encroached Sky、Polyphonic
desc.jp: Get ready for combat!Example: Encroached Sky、Polyphonic
desc.zh_cn: 全体就绪，准备战斗！举例/联想：Encroached Sky、Polyphonic

desc.en: Ayumu is a member of the General Student Council.
desc.jp: Ayumu is a member of the General Student Council.
desc.zh_cn: 步是联邦学生会的一名成员。

desc.en: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.jp: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.zh_cn: 桃香是基沃托斯学生会交通部的部长，在新手教程以及其他一些剧情中均有出现。个人性格很懒，喜欢逃避事情，还喜欢天天吃她的明太子味薯片。在当前设定下，桃香的主要任务就是把任务分配给老师做。

desc.en: Rin is the Vice President of the General Student Council. She appears in the Tutorial and Volume Final.

desc.zh_cn: 琳是联邦学生会的副会长，在新手教程以及终章中出现过。

hobby.zh_cn_jp: 确认今日运势、一切神秘事物
hobby.zh_cn_tw: 确认今天的运势、所有的神秘事物
hobby.zh_cn_cn: 确认今日运势、一切神秘事物

desc.en: 莉音批評了陽葵，說放棄這種話可不像能出自她口。陽葵先是感到詫異，但隨後發現倒計時停止在先前的9秒鐘——莉音解釋是她用多次元詮釋系統抑制了方舟的連線，但只不過是權宜之計。莉音向眾人請求幫助，陽葵則指出這艘船一定有訊號中繼器之類的東西，只要破壞就能斷開連線；在斷開期間，只要能修復好生命守衛者艦艇，就能反而啟動方舟的自爆程式。
desc.jp: 莉音批評了陽葵，說放棄這種話可不像能出自她口。陽葵先是感到詫異，但隨後發現倒計時停止在先前的9秒鐘——莉音解釋是她用多次元詮釋系統抑制了方舟的連線，但只不過是權宜之計。莉音向眾人請求幫助，陽葵則指出這艘船一定有訊號中繼器之類的東西，只要破壞就能斷開連線；在斷開期間，只要能修復好生命守衛者艦艇，就能反而啟動方舟的自爆程式。
desc.zh_cn: {cf莉音}批评了{cf阳葵}，说放弃这种话可不像能出自她口。{cf阳葵}先是感到诧异，但随后发现倒计时停止在先前的9秒钟——{cf莉音}解释是她用多次元诠释系统抑制了方舟的连接，但只不过是权宜之计。{cf莉音}向众人请求帮助，{cf阳葵}则指出这艘船一定有信号中继器之类的东西，只要破坏就能断开连接；在断开期间，只要能修复好生命守卫者舰艇，就能反而启动方舟的自爆程序。

desc.en: Shiroko (Terror) is a student appearing in Volume Final. She's essentially an alternative version of Shiroko, but interacted with Chroma and became a Nameless Goddess. She has close relationships with Phrenapates, who seemed to be the Sensei of her own.
desc.jp: Shiroko (Terror) is a student appearing in Volume Final. She's essentially an alternative version of Shiroko, but interacted with Chroma and became a Nameless Goddess. She has close relationships with Phrenapates, who seemed to be the Sensei of her own.
desc.zh_cn: 白子（恐怖）是一名在最终篇中出现的学生。她本质上就是普通白子的另一版本，只不过接触了色彩并成为了无名众神的一员。她与诱骗者的关系很近，后者似乎是她的老师。

desc.en: 然而陽葵表示從上層到下層有至少1200m遠，並且花子指出安全系統很難破壞，在駭入的情況下唯有同時破壞東、西兩邊的解除裝置才能開啟下層大門——但即便那樣也只能持續五秒。更麻煩的是，下層還沒有人能這麼快移動。
desc.jp: 然而陽葵表示從上層到下層有至少1200m遠，並且花子指出安全系統很難破壞，在駭入的情況下唯有同時破壞東、西兩邊的解除裝置才能開啟下層大門——但即便那樣也只能持續五秒。更麻煩的是，下層還沒有人能這麼快移動。
desc.zh_cn: 然而{cf阳葵}表示从上层到下层有至少1200m远，并且{cf花子}指出安全系统很难破坏，在骇入的情况下唯有同时破坏东、西两边的解除装置才能打开下层大门——但即便那样也只能持续五秒。更麻烦的是，下层还没有人能这么快移动。

desc.en: 隱藏在地上的聖所出現了，邁向破滅的倒數速度也加快了。季在搜尋過程中發現了聖所，單槍匹馬去進行攻略。美食研究會與風華甩掉了窮追不捨的敵人，往阿特拉哈西斯的方舟的最下層移動。
desc.jp: 隱藏在地上的聖所出現了，邁向破滅的倒數速度也加快了。季在搜尋過程中發現了聖所，單槍匹馬去進行攻略。美食研究會與風華甩掉了窮追不捨的敵人，往阿特拉哈西斯的方舟的最下層移動。
desc.zh_cn: 隐藏在地上的圣所出现了，迈向破灭的倒数速度也加快了。{cf季}在搜索过程中发现了圣所，单枪匹马去进行攻略。{cn美食研究会}与{cf风华}甩掉了穷追不舍的敌人，往阿特拉哈西斯的方舟的最下层移动。

desc.en: 白子不願放棄。老師指出就像以前一樣，他一定是會來阻止白子的——另一位白子一樣同意。

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。

desc.en: Shiroko (Terror) is a student appearing in Volume Final. She's essentially an alternative version of Shiroko, but interacted with Chroma and became a Nameless Goddess. She has close relationships with Phrenapates, who seemed to be the Sensei of her own.
desc.jp: Shiroko (Terror) is a student appearing in Volume Final. She's essentially an alternative version of Shiroko, but interacted with Chroma and became a Nameless Goddess. She has close relationships with Phrenapates, who seemed to be the Sensei of her own.
desc.zh_cn: 白子（恐怖）是一名在最终篇中出现的学生。她本质上就是普通白子的另一版本，只不过接触了色彩并成为了无名众神的一员。她与诱骗者的关系很近，后者似乎是她的老师。

desc.en: 這時A.R.O.N.A.突然說明，聖所顯現程式（incarnation）已將聖所從凍結狀態中解除，由此加速多次元演繹的計算速度。
desc.jp: 這時A.R.O.N.A.突然說明，聖所顯現程式（incarnation）已將聖所從凍結狀態中解除，由此加速多次元演繹的計算速度。
desc.zh_cn: 这时A.R.O.N.A.突然说明，圣所显现程序（incarnation）已将圣所从冻结状态中解除，由此加速多次元演绎的计算速度。
举例/联想：Let me think about it

desc.en: Phrenapates is an adult appeared in the Volume Final. He has the very same power with Sensei, and is considered to be the Sensei himself being in another timeline, in which the Kivotos had fallen for some reasons. The "Phrenapates" is, according to Shiroko (Terror, from that timeline), dead and was transformed by the Iridescence.
desc.jp: Phrenapates is an adult appeared in the Volume Final. He has the very same power with Sensei, and is considered to be the Sensei himself being in another timeline, in which the Kivotos had fallen for some reasons. The "Phrenapates" is, according to Shiroko (Terror, from that timeline), dead and was transformed by the Iridescence.
desc.zh_cn: 诱骗者是个在终章中出现的大人。他拥有与老师完全一样的能力，一般被视作为另一时间线上（基沃托斯莫名毁灭）的老师。根据白子（恐怖）的说法，“诱骗者”其实已经死亡，其当时的状态是因为色彩转化。

desc.en: Plana is the very AI that manages the Shittem Chest, basically an "early version" of Arona. Arona and Plana has a unique relationship, for Arona could be the GSC President herself, and Plana was created by her first.
desc.jp: Plana is the very AI that manages the Shittem Chest, basically an "early version" of Arona. Arona and Plana has a unique relationship, for Arona could be the GSC President herself, and Plana was created by her first.
desc.zh_cn: 星奈（民间音译为“普拉娜”）是老师平板的AI管理员，基本上可被视作为彩奈的“早期版本”。彩奈和星奈之间的关系非同寻常，因为前者似乎就是联邦学生会会长她自己，而后者则正由会长所创造。

desc.en: 連線抑制時間大幅縮短，貝裡塔斯眾人大為震驚。
desc.jp: 連線抑制時間大幅縮短，貝裡塔斯眾人大為震驚。
desc.zh_cn: 连接抑制时间大幅缩短，{cn贝里塔斯}众人大为震惊。
举例/联想：Let me think about it

desc.en: 這時在方舟上的陽葵表示，她觀測到了地上有聖所正在出現，雖然無法目視——這時眾人才發覺，敵人是將聖所轉移到了他們看不見的地方。
desc.jp: 這時在方舟上的陽葵表示，她觀測到了地上有聖所正在出現，雖然無法目視——這時眾人才發覺，敵人是將聖所轉移到了他們看不見的地方。
desc.zh_cn: 这时在方舟上的{cf阳葵}表示，她观测到了地上有圣所正在出现，虽然无法目视——这时众人才发觉，敌人是将圣所转移到了他们看不见的地方。
举例/联想：Let me think about it

desc.en: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.jp: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 莉音是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 莉音是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。

desc.en: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.jp: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.zh_cn: 桃香是基沃托斯学生会交通部的部长，在新手教程以及其他一些剧情中均有出现。个人性格很懒，喜欢逃避事情，还喜欢天天吃她的明太子味薯片。在当前设定下，桃香的主要任务就是把任务分配给老师做。

desc.en: Ayumu is a member of the General Student Council.
desc.jp: Ayumu is a member of the General Student Council.
desc.zh_cn: 步是联邦学生会的一名成员。

desc.en: 季與方舟上的陽葵聯絡，試圖表明自己所在的地區出現了聖所，但連線立刻中斷，同時還出現了大量敵人。在撤退與應戰之間，季認為自己所處的地區非常關鍵，因而決定應戰，幫助方舟上的老師。
desc.jp: 季與方舟上的陽葵聯絡，試圖表明自己所在的地區出現了聖所，但連線立刻中斷，同時還出現了大量敵人。在撤退與應戰之間，季認為自己所處的地區非常關鍵，因而決定應戰，幫助方舟上的老師。
desc.zh_cn: {cf季}与方舟上的{cf阳葵}联系，试图表明自己所在的地区出现了圣所，但连接立刻中断，同时还出现了大量敌人。在撤退与应战之间，{cf季}认为自己所处的地区非常关键，因而决定应战，帮助方舟上的老师。
举例/联想：Let me think about it

desc.en: 陽葵和莉音立刻接入連線，季對能連上裝甲一事感到些許驚訝。莉音要求季立刻撤離，停止應戰，但季違抗了她的命令，並希望所有人能在她抵抗的這段時間裡完成必要的事情。
desc.jp: 陽葵和莉音立刻接入連線，季對能連上裝甲一事感到些許驚訝。莉音要求季立刻撤離，停止應戰，但季違抗了她的命令，並希望所有人能在她抵抗的這段時間裡完成必要的事情。
desc.zh_cn: {cf阳葵}和{cf莉音}立刻接入连接，{cf季}对能连上装甲一事感到些许惊讶。{cf莉音}要求{cf季}立刻撤离，停止应战，但{cf季}违抗了她的命令，并希望所有人能在她抵抗的这段时间里完成必要的事情。
举例/联想：Let me think about it

desc.en: 風華同學全速駕駛著供給部的小車，敵人緊追不捨。在下一個轉角處，風華正準備轉過，但通訊中卻傳來了讓人不安的尖叫聲。亞子為眾人捏了把汗。
desc.jp: 風華同學全速駕駛著供給部的小車，敵人緊追不捨。在下一個轉角處，風華正準備轉過，但通訊中卻傳來了讓人不安的尖叫聲。亞子為眾人捏了把汗。
desc.zh_cn: {cf风华}同学全速驾驶着{cn供给部}的小车，敌人紧追不舍。在下一个转角处，{cf风华}正准备转过，但通讯中却传来了让人不安的尖叫声。{cf亚子}为众人捏了把汗。
举例/联想：Let me think about it

desc.en: 季因為無名守護者的攻擊而陷入危機當中。阿特拉哈西斯方舟的解除裝置一一被破壞，最終總算是切斷了與方舟的連結。
desc.jp: 季因為無名守護者的攻擊而陷入危機當中。阿特拉哈西斯方舟的解除裝置一一被破壞，最終總算是切斷了與方舟的連結。
desc.zh_cn: {cf季}因为无名守护者的攻击而陷入危机当中。阿特拉哈西斯方舟的解除设备一一被破坏，最终总算是切断了与方舟的链接。

desc.en: 在地上，貝裡塔斯突然驚恐的發現抑制時間倒計時又加速了起來，甚至比先前還快。

desc.en: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.jp: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 莉音是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。

desc.en: 方舟深處，在一陣輕微的晃動後，A.R.O.N.A.和白子感覺到了什麼。
desc.jp: 方舟深處，在一陣輕微的晃動後，A.R.O.N.A.和白子感覺到了什麼。
desc.zh_cn: 方舟深处，在一阵轻微的晃动后，A.R.O.N.A.和{cf白子}感觉到了什么。

desc.en: Plana is the very AI that manages the Shittem Chest, basically an "early version" of Arona. Arona and Plana has a unique relationship, for Arona could be the GSC President herself, and Plana was created by her first.
desc.jp: Plana is the very AI that manages the Shittem Chest, basically an "early version" of Arona. Arona and Plana has a unique relationship, for Arona could be the GSC President herself, and Plana was created by her first.
desc.zh_cn: 星奈（民间音译为“普拉娜”）是老师平板的AI管理员，基本上可被视作为彩奈的“早期版本”。彩奈和星奈之间的关系非同寻常，因为前者似乎就是联邦学生会会长她自己，而后者则正由会长所创造。

desc.en: Shiroko (Terror) is a student appearing in Volume Final. She's essentially an alternative version of Shiroko, but interacted with Chroma and became a Nameless Goddess. She has close relationships with Phrenapates, who seemed to be the Sensei of her own.
desc.jp: Shiroko (Terror) is a student appearing in Volume Final. She's essentially an alternative version of Shiroko, but interacted with Chroma and became a Nameless Goddess. She has close relationships with Phrenapates, who seemed to be the Sensei of her own.
desc.zh_cn: 白子（恐怖）是一名在最终篇中出现的学生。她本质上就是普通白子的另一版本，只不过接触了色彩并成为了无名众神的一员。她与诱骗者的关系很近，后者似乎是她的老师。

desc.en: 另一邊，在生命守護者的艦橋上，所有人露出了久違的笑容，鬆了一口氣。
desc.jp: 另一邊，在生命守護者的艦橋上，所有人露出了久違的笑容，鬆了一口氣。
desc.zh_cn: 另一边，在生命守护者的舰桥上，所有人露出了久违的笑容，松了一口气。

desc.en: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.jp: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.zh_cn: 桃香是基沃托斯学生会交通部的部长，在新手教程以及其他一些剧情中均有出现。个人性格很懒，喜欢逃避事情，还喜欢天天吃她的明太子味薯片。在当前设定下，桃香的主要任务就是把任务分配给老师做。

desc.en: Rin is the Vice President of the General Student Council. She appears in the Tutorial and Volume Final.
desc.jp: Rin is the Vice President of the General Student Council. She appears in the Tutorial and Volume Final.
desc.zh_cn: 琳是联邦学生会的副会长，在新手教程以及终章中出现过。

desc.en: Ayumu is a member of the General Student Council.
desc.jp: Ayumu is a member of the General Student Council.
desc.zh_cn: 步是联邦学生会的一名成员。

desc.en: 方舟的自爆程式再次開始了。大家在準備逃脫的過程中，學生們為了協助老師而聚集在一起。為了讓世界走向滅亡，另一個白子與老師展開了決戰。
desc.jp: 方舟的自爆程式再次開始了。大家在準備逃脫的過程中，學生們為了協助老師而聚集在一起。為了讓世界走向滅亡，另一個白子與老師展開了決戰。
desc.zh_cn: 方舟的自爆程序再次开始了。大家在准备逃脱的过程中，学生们为了协助老师而聚集在一起。为了让世界走向灭亡，另一个{cf白子}与老师展开了决战。

desc.en: A.R.O.N.A.依據程式開始嘗試備用連線，但連線請求均被拒絕；隨後她試圖用聖所加速計算，但聖所已被破壞。A.R.O.N.A.不得不宣佈計劃將有可能失敗。
desc.jp: A.R.O.N.A.依據程式開始嘗試備用連線，但連線請求均被拒絕；隨後她試圖用聖所加速計算，但聖所已被破壞。A.R.O.N.A.不得不宣佈計劃將有可能失敗。
desc.zh_cn: A.R.O.N.A.依据程序开始尝试备用连接，但连接请求均被拒绝；随后她试图用圣所加速计算，但圣所已被破坏。A.R.O.N.A.不得不宣布计划将有可能失败。

desc.en: Shiroko (Terror) is a student appearing in Volume Final. She's essentially an alternative version of Shiroko, but interacted with Chroma and became a Nameless Goddess. She has close relationships with Phrenapates, who seemed to be the Sensei of her own.
desc.jp: Shiroko (Terror) is a student appearing in Volume Final. She's essentially an alternative version of Shiroko, but interacted with Chroma and became a Nameless Goddess. She has close relationships with Phrenapates, who seemed to be the Sensei of her own.
desc.zh_cn: 白子（恐怖）是一名在最终篇中出现的学生。她本质上就是普通白子的另一版本，只不过接触了色彩并成为了无名众神的一员。她与诱骗者的关系很近，后者似乎是她的老师。

desc.en: Plana is the very AI that manages the Shittem Chest, basically an "early version" of Arona. Arona and Plana has a unique relationship, for Arona could be the GSC President herself, and Plana was created by her first.
desc.jp: Plana is the very AI that manages the Shittem Chest, basically an "early version" of Arona. Arona and Plana has a unique relationship, for Arona could be the GSC President herself, and Plana was created by her first.
desc.zh_cn: 星奈（民间音译为“普拉娜”）是老师平板的AI管理员，基本上可被视作为彩奈的“早期版本”。彩奈和星奈之间的关系非同寻常，因为前者似乎就是联邦学生会会长她自己，而后者则正由会长所创造。

desc.en: 方舟內部響起警報，A.R.O.N.A.宣佈方舟的自爆程式已啟動，並指出爆炸後多次元詮釋功能將永久消失。A.R.O.N.A.試圖重啟聖所顯現程式，但因資源不足無法啟動，操作被迫取消。
desc.jp: 方舟內部響起警報，A.R.O.N.A.宣佈方舟的自爆程式已啟動，並指出爆炸後多次元詮釋功能將永久消失。A.R.O.N.A.試圖重啟聖所顯現程式，但因資源不足無法啟動，操作被迫取消。
desc.zh_cn: 方舟内部响起警报，A.R.O.N.A.宣布方舟的自爆程序已启动，并指出爆炸后多次元诠释功能将永久消失。A.R.O.N.A.试图重启圣所显现程序，但因资源不足无法启动，操作被迫取消。

desc.en: Plana is the very AI that manages the Shittem Chest, basically an "early version" of Arona. Arona and Plana has a unique relationship, for Arona could be the GSC President herself, and Plana was created by her first.
desc.jp: Plana is the very AI that manages the Shittem Chest, basically an "early version" of Arona. Arona and Plana has a unique relationship, for Arona could be the GSC President herself, and Plana was created by her first.
desc.zh_cn: 星奈（民间音译为“普拉娜”）是老师平板的AI管理员，基本上可被视作为彩奈的“早期版本”。彩奈和星奈之间的关系非同寻常，因为前者似乎就是联邦学生会会长她自己，而后者则正由会长所创造。

desc.en: 被聖所染紅的天空再次變藍。
desc.jp: 被聖所染紅的天空再次變藍。
desc.zh_cn: 被圣所染红的天空再次变蓝。

desc.en: 美食研究會成功破壞安全系統，風華也因體力不支而倒下。眾人決定在爆炸前去幫助老師。
desc.jp: 美食研究會成功破壞安全系統，風華也因體力不支而倒下。眾人決定在爆炸前去幫助老師。
desc.zh_cn: {cn美食研究会}成功破坏安全系统，{cf风华}也因体力不支而倒下。众人决定在爆炸前去帮助老师。

hobby.jp: ゲテモノ料理を食べること、作ること
hobby.zh_cn_tw: 制作古怪食物、吃古怪食物
hobby.zh_cn_cn: 制作黑暗料理、享用黑暗料理

hobby.en: Cooking homestyle dishes, packing bento lunches

hobby.zh_cn_cn: 美食探店、制作美食清单

desc.en: 對策委員會發現天空變回藍色。眾人決定在將老師與白子救出後立即離開，綾音表示會堅持到最後一刻。
desc.jp: 對策委員會發現天空變回藍色。眾人決定在將老師與白子救出後立即離開，綾音表示會堅持到最後一刻。
desc.zh_cn: {cn对策委员会}发现天空变回蓝色。众人决定在将老师与{cf白子}救出后立即离开，{cf绫音}表示会坚持到最后一刻。

desc.en: The 12th track in Blue Archive, used especially in the "Story" page and its subpages, as well as at the end of every story (To Be Continued).
desc.jp: The 12th track in Blue Archive, used especially in the "Story" page and its subpages, as well as at the end of every story (To Be Continued).

desc.en: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.jp: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.zh_cn: 干就完了，奥利给！举例/联想：System All Green

desc.en: 優香想讓遊戲開發部回到艦橋，準備使用莉音會長的逃脫程式。但四人拒絕執行優香的命令，並前往中央區幫助老師。優香先是一驚，但隨後表示同意。
desc.jp: 優香想讓遊戲開發部回到艦橋，準備使用莉音會長的逃脫程式。但四人拒絕執行優香的命令，並前往中央區幫助老師。優香先是一驚，但隨後表示同意。
desc.zh_cn: {cf优香}想让{cn游戏开发部}回到舰桥，准备使用{cf莉音}会长的逃脱程序。但四人拒绝执行{cf优香}的命令，并前往中央区帮助老师。{cf优香}先是一惊，但随后表示同意。

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.jp:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.zh_cn:
蔚蓝档案OST的第十七首曲子，常在“商店”页播放，也是优香回忆大厅的主题曲。
曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。

desc.en: A.R.O.N.A.警告自爆程式一旦啟動，方舟內部的人的生存概率將無限接近於零。另一位白子這時才意識到老師一直都是在拖延時間，等待大家到來。A.R.O.N.A.試圖透過其他途徑解決生命守護者的威脅，但被另一位白子叫住：她意識到老師不論如何都會克服困難、創造奇蹟，因而最佳方案應是先除掉老師。
desc.jp: A.R.O.N.A.警告自爆程式一旦啟動，方舟內部的人的生存概率將無限接近於零。另一位白子這時才意識到老師一直都是在拖延時間，等待大家到來。A.R.O.N.A.試圖透過其他途徑解決生命守護者的威脅，但被另一位白子叫住：她意識到老師不論如何都會克服困難、創造奇蹟，因而最佳方案應是先除掉老師。
desc.zh_cn: A.R.O.N.A.警告自爆程序一旦启动，方舟内部的人的生存概率将无限接近于零。另一位{cf白子}这时才意识到老师一直都是在拖延时间，等待大家到来。A.R.O.N.A.试图通过{sn其他}途径解决生命守护者的威胁，但被另一位{cf白子}叫住：她意识到老师不论如何都会克服困难、创造奇迹，因而最佳方案应是先除掉老师。

desc.en: Plana is the very AI that manages the Shittem Chest, basically an "early version" of Arona. Arona and Plana has a unique relationship, for Arona could be the GSC President herself, and Plana was created by her first.
desc.jp: Plana is the very AI that manages the Shittem Chest, basically an "early version" of Arona. Arona and Plana has a unique relationship, for Arona could be the GSC President herself, and Plana was created by her first.

desc.en: Shiroko (Terror) is a student appearing in Volume Final. She's essentially an alternative version of Shiroko, but interacted with Chroma and became a Nameless Goddess. She has close relationships with Phrenapates, who seemed to be the Sensei of her own.

desc.en: Phrenapates is an adult appeared in the Volume Final. He has the very same power with Sensei, and is considered to be the Sensei himself being in another timeline, in which the Kivotos had fallen for some reasons. The "Phrenapates" is, according to Shiroko (Terror, from that timeline), dead and was transformed by the Iridescence.
desc.jp: Phrenapates is an adult appeared in the Volume Final. He has the very same power with Sensei, and is considered to be the Sensei himself being in another timeline, in which the Kivotos had fallen for some reasons. The "Phrenapates" is, according to Shiroko (Terror, from that timeline), dead and was transformed by the Iridescence.
desc.zh_cn: 诱骗者是个在终章中出现的大人。他拥有与老师完全一样的能力，一般被视作为另一时间线上（基沃托斯莫名毁灭）的老师。根据白子（恐怖）的说法，“诱骗者”其实已经死亡，其当时的状态是因为色彩转化。

desc.en: 另一位白子的話轉變了誘騙者的思路，他命令A.R.O.N.A.轉換為戰鬥支援模式。老師不甘落後，叫出了彩奈進行協助。另一位白子警告老師自己的能力與這一時間線上的大家都很不同，老師則拿出了大人的卡片。
desc.jp: 另一位白子的話轉變了誘騙者的思路，他命令A.R.O.N.A.轉換為戰鬥支援模式。老師不甘落後，叫出了彩奈進行協助。另一位白子警告老師自己的能力與這一時間線上的大家都很不同，老師則拿出了大人的卡片。
desc.zh_cn: 另一位{cf白子}的话转变了诱骗者的思路，他命令A.R.O.N.A.转换为战斗支援模式。老师不甘落后，叫出了{cf彩奈}进行协助。另一位{cf白子}警告老师自己的能力与这一时间线上的大家都很不同，老师则拿出了大人的卡片。

desc.jp: Plana is the very AI that manages the Shittem Chest, basically an "early version" of Arona. Arona and Plana has a unique relationship, for Arona could be the GSC President herself, and Plana was created by her first.
desc.zh_cn: 星奈（民间音译为“普拉娜”）是老师平板的AI管理员，基本上可被视作为彩奈的“早期版本”。彩奈和星奈之间的关系非同寻常，因为前者似乎就是联邦学生会会长她自己，而后者则正由会长所创造。

desc.en: Arona is the system manager of the Shittim Chest in Blue Archive, who is set to be a personal assistant for Sensei. She is overall blue, recalling the game title Blue Archive. Though being cute, Arona seldom brings Sensei a 3-star student when recruiting, which is unknown for being either accidentally or intentionally. In Chinese (Traditional) translation, Arona is called "彩奈", with the "彩" (rainbow) indicating the color of the letter for a 3-star student; from some aspects, it might be an intensional case for wishing more 3-star students.
desc.jp: Arona is the system manager of the Shittim Chest in Blue Archive, who is set to be a personal assistant for Sensei. She is overall blue, recalling the game title Blue Archive. Though being cute, Arona seldom brings Sensei a 3-star student when recruiting, which is unknown for being either accidentally or intentionally. In Chinese (Traditional) translation, Arona is called "彩奈", with the "彩" (rainbow) indicating the color of the letter for a 3-star student; from some aspects, it might be an intensional case for wishing more 3-star students.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 阿罗娜(Arona)是蔚蓝档案中的“什锦之箱”中的系统管理员，设定上是一个辅助老师的个人小助理。阿罗娜的整体色调是蓝色，与游戏名称“蔚蓝/碧蓝档案”相呼应。尽管长得很可爱，阿罗娜在帮助老师招募学生时却经常会不出三星，具体是故意还是不小心的就不得人知了。国际服繁中将其称呼为“彩奈”，某种层面上看可能是在希望阿罗娜能够多出点彩（bushi）。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 彩奈(英文名 Arona 直译为 阿罗娜)是蔚蓝档案中的“什锦之箱”中的系统管理员，设定上是一个辅助老师的个人小助理。彩奈的整体色调是蓝色，与游戏名称“蔚蓝/碧蓝档案”相呼应。尽管长得很可爱，彩奈在帮助老师招募学生时却经常会不出三星，具体是故意还是不小心的就不得人知了。从某种层面上看，繁中有意在其名字中加入“彩”一字，大概也是寄托着出彩的希望（bushi）。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 彩奈(英文名 Arona 直译为 阿罗娜)是蔚蓝档案中的“什锦之箱”中的系统管理员，设定上是一个辅助老师的个人小助理。彩奈的整体色调是蓝色，与游戏名称“蔚蓝/碧蓝档案”相呼应。尽管长得很可爱，彩奈在帮助老师招募学生时却经常会不出三星，具体是故意还是不小心的就不得人知了。从某种层面上看，繁中有意在其名字中加入“彩”一字，大概也是寄托着出彩的希望（bushi）。

desc.en: 另一位白子表示清楚老師的能力，但同時提醒老師：他面前的誘騙者，也是他自己，也是一位老師。彩奈指出誘騙者似乎掏出了一樣東西：一個已經嚴重碳化、但尚且完整的銀行卡。決戰一觸即發。【注意：本劇情過後即跳轉到活動劇情】
desc.jp: 另一位白子表示清楚老師的能力，但同時提醒老師：他面前的誘騙者，也是他自己，也是一位老師。彩奈指出誘騙者似乎掏出了一樣東西：一個已經嚴重碳化、但尚且完整的銀行卡。決戰一觸即發。【注意：本劇情過後即跳轉到活動劇情】
desc.zh_cn: 另一位{cf白子}表示清楚老师的能力，但同时提醒老师：他面前的诱骗者，也是他自己，也是一位老师。{cf彩奈}指出诱骗者似乎掏出了一样东西：一个已经严重碳化、但尚且完整的银行卡。决战一触即发。【注意：本剧情过后即跳转到活动剧情】

desc.en: Shiroko (Terror) is a student appearing in Volume Final. She's essentially an alternative version of Shiroko, but interacted with Chroma and became a Nameless Goddess. She has close relationships with Phrenapates, who seemed to be the Sensei of her own.
desc.jp: Shiroko (Terror) is a student appearing in Volume Final. She's essentially an alternative version of Shiroko, but interacted with Chroma and became a Nameless Goddess. She has close relationships with Phrenapates, who seemed to be the Sensei of her own.
desc.zh_cn: 白子（恐怖）是一名在最终篇中出现的学生。她本质上就是普通白子的另一版本，只不过接触了色彩并成为了无名众神的一员。她与诱骗者的关系很近，后者似乎是她的老师。

desc.en: Phrenapates is an adult appeared in the Volume Final. He has the very same power with Sensei, and is considered to be the Sensei himself being in another timeline, in which the Kivotos had fallen for some reasons. The "Phrenapates" is, according to Shiroko (Terror, from that timeline), dead and was transformed by the Iridescence.
desc.jp: Phrenapates is an adult appeared in the Volume Final. He has the very same power with Sensei, and is considered to be the Sensei himself being in another timeline, in which the Kivotos had fallen for some reasons. The "Phrenapates" is, according to Shiroko (Terror, from that timeline), dead and was transformed by the Iridescence.
desc.zh_cn: 诱骗者是个在终章中出现的大人。他拥有与老师完全一样的能力，一般被视作为另一时间线上（基沃托斯莫名毁灭）的老师。根据白子（恐怖）的说法，“诱骗者”其实已经死亡，其当时的状态是因为色彩转化。

desc.en: The last trial in the way of the Ninjutsu Research Club is the Trick House, where Kaede is the gatekeeper. When everyone is united to face the trial, Michiru, who acts hastily out of urgency, gets caught in the Trick House's trap along with Sensei.

desc.zh_cn: 最后阻挡着{cn忍术研究部}的，是由{cf枫}担任守门人的机关屋试炼。正当大家要齐心协力面对试炼的时候。被着急的心牵引的{cf三千留}和老师一起被卷入机关屋的陷阱。

The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.zh_cn:
蔚蓝档案OST的第十七首曲子，常在“商店”页播放，也是优香回忆大厅的主题曲。
曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。

desc.en: The Ninjutsu Research Club helps run the Hyakkiyako and Gehenna meeting so they can earn official club status.Will they be able to pull it off?
desc.jp: The Ninjutsu Research Club helps run the Hyakkiyako and Gehenna meeting so they can earn official club status.Will they be able to pull it off?
desc.zh_cn:
为了成为正式的社团，{cn忍术研究部}决定协助{sn百鬼夜行}和{sn格黑娜}的交流会。
然而这两所学园的交流会想必无法风平浪静地结束……
面对眼前各式各样的问题，少女们得出的答案究竟会是什么呢！？

desc.en: Fuuka gets to work assessing the Sparrow's state and calls on the Chirp Supermarket for help. Unfortunately, the Gourmet Helmet Gang overhears this. Fuuka returns to Sparrow to cook with the Restaurateur and asks Haruna to evaluate the results. They're interrupted by a raid from the Gourmet Helmet Gang.
desc.jp: Fuuka gets to work assessing the Sparrow's state and calls on the Chirp Supermarket for help. Unfortunately, the Gourmet Helmet Gang overhears this. Fuuka returns to Sparrow to cook with the Restaurateur and asks Haruna to evaluate the results. They're interrupted by a raid from the Gourmet Helmet Gang.
desc.zh_cn: {cf风华}为了查看麻雀亭的状况和解决问题，于是便向小哔超市寻求协助，但饕餮头盔团目睹了此一情况。回到麻雀亭的{cf风华}和老板娘一起制作食物，然后请{cf羽留奈}进行试吃评估。就在这个时候，饕餮头盔团闯入了麻雀亭。

desc.en: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。

desc.en: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.jp: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.zh_cn: 干就完了，奥利给！举例/联想：System All Green

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.

desc.zh_cn: 大部分战斗曲均具备此特性，一般的表现形式为鼓点快、元素偏多的情况。

举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

name.zh_cn: 正餐前的开胃年菜～一局定输赢～

desc.en: The Gourmet Research Society discovers that Sparrow will be closing soon! To save the restaurant, they need to get help from the School Lunch Club. The School Lunch Club agrees to help--but only if the Gourmet Research Society can resolve an issue with Nyao Foods, a large distributor...
desc.jp: The Gourmet Research Society discovers that Sparrow will be closing soon! To save the restaurant, they need to get help from the School Lunch Club. The School Lunch Club agrees to help--but only if the Gourmet Research Society can resolve an issue with Nyao Foods, a large distributor...
desc.zh_cn: 年关将近，久违发现令人满足的名店「麻雀亭」的{cn美食研究会}，得知了该店正面临关门的危机……破天荒的{cn美食研究会}与{cf风华}交织而成的店铺重建闹剧──正式开幕！

name.zh_cn: 正餐前的开胃年菜～一局定输赢～

desc.en: The Gourmet Research Society discovers that Sparrow will be closing soon! To save the restaurant, they need to get help from the School Lunch Club. The School Lunch Club agrees to help--but only if the Gourmet Research Society can resolve an issue with Nyao Foods, a large distributor...
desc.jp: The Gourmet Research Society discovers that Sparrow will be closing soon! To save the restaurant, they need to get help from the School Lunch Club. The School Lunch Club agrees to help--but only if the Gourmet Research Society can resolve an issue with Nyao Foods, a large distributor...
desc.zh_cn: 年关将近，久违发现令人满足的名店「麻雀亭」的{cn美食研究会}，得知了该店正面临关门的危机……破天荒的{cn美食研究会}与{cf风华}交织而成的店铺重建闹剧──正式开幕！

desc.en: In the midst of preparing for the cooking battle, Fuuka is struggling. Sensei realizes that she is overexerting herself, and encourages her to take a break. Haruna and Sensei visit Gehenna on advice from Juri. Haruna finds Fuuka on the rooftop of the School Lunch Club building, lost in thought, and shares some stories with her.
desc.jp: In the midst of preparing for the cooking battle, Fuuka is struggling. Sensei realizes that she is overexerting herself, and encourages her to take a break. Haruna and Sensei visit Gehenna on advice from Juri. Haruna finds Fuuka on the rooftop of the School Lunch Club building, lost in thought, and shares some stories with her.
desc.zh_cn: {cf风华}为了进行料理对决而孤军奋战，但老师发现{cf风华}太逞强了，于是便建议她要好好休息。听完{cf茱莉}的话后，{cf羽留奈}和老师便前往{sn格黑娜}。{cf风华}在{cn供给部}屋顶上沉思，此时，{cf羽留奈}走过来和她谈话。

desc.en: Ayumu is a member of the General Student Council.
desc.jp: Ayumu is a member of the General Student Council.
desc.zh_cn: 步是联邦学生会的一名成员。

desc.en: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.jp: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.zh_cn: 桃香是基沃托斯学生会交通部的部长，在新手教程以及其他一些剧情中均有出现。个人性格很懒，喜欢逃避事情，还喜欢天天吃她的明太子味薯片。在当前设定下，桃香的主要任务就是把任务分配给老师做。

desc.en: Rin is the Vice President of the General Student Council. She appears in the Tutorial and Volume Final.
desc.jp: Rin is the Vice President of the General Student Council. She appears in the Tutorial and Volume Final.
desc.zh_cn: 琳是联邦学生会的副会长，在新手教程以及终章中出现过。

desc.zh_cn: 总攻击的准备已经就绪。攸关奇普托斯命运的联合作战，即将开幕。

desc.en: 如果不立刻啟動自爆程式，一切都會化為泡影。陽葵啟動了自爆程式。必須在方舟完全崩塌前擊倒誘騙者，然後逃出這個地方。
desc.jp: 如果不立刻啟動自爆程式，一切都會化為泡影。陽葵啟動了自爆程式。必須在方舟完全崩塌前擊倒誘騙者，然後逃出這個地方。
desc.zh_cn: 如果不立刻启动自爆程序，一切都会化为泡影。{cf阳葵}启动了自爆程序。必须在方舟完全崩塌前击倒诱骗者，然后逃出这个地方。

desc.en: 集中的能量造成了方舟各地區的緊急情況。優香斷定自爆程式必須啟動，否則將再沒有機會；然而陽葵表示程式尚不穩定，強行啟動可能導致全員喪命。另一邊，美食研究會和遊戲開發部抵達控制室，阿拜多斯也將支援老師戰鬥。
desc.jp: 集中的能量造成了方舟各地區的緊急情況。優香斷定自爆程式必須啟動，否則將再沒有機會；然而陽葵表示程式尚不穩定，強行啟動可能導致全員喪命。另一邊，美食研究會和遊戲開發部抵達控制室，阿拜多斯也將支援老師戰鬥。
desc.zh_cn: 集中的能量造成了方舟各地区的紧急情况。{cf优香}断定自爆程序必须启动，否则将再没有机会；然而{cf阳葵}表示程序尚不稳定，强行启动可能导致全员丧命。另一边，{cn美食研究会}和{cn游戏开发部}抵达控制室，{sn阿拜多斯}也将支持老师战斗。

desc.en: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry

desc.zh_cn: 有些时候，停下来饮杯茶也不错。举例/联想：Cherry Merry Berry

desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。

desc.en: 在決定按下之前，琳向莉音詢問逃脫程式的原理，後者則表示其是能利用方舟的計算使人躍遷到地面上的裝置，並已根據人數設定為共能使用23人次——除了必須在爆炸前儘快轉移。
desc.jp: 在決定按下之前，琳向莉音詢問逃脫程式的原理，後者則表示其是能利用方舟的計算使人躍遷到地面上的裝置，並已根據人數設定為共能使用23人次——除了必須在爆炸前儘快轉移。
desc.zh_cn: 在决定按下之前，{cf琳}向{cf莉音}询问逃脱程序的原理，后者则表示其是能利用方舟的计算使人跃迁到地面上的装置，并已根据人数设定为共能使用23人次——除了必须在爆炸前尽快转移。

desc.en: Rin is the Vice President of the General Student Council. She appears in the Tutorial and Volume Final.
desc.jp: Rin is the Vice President of the General Student Council. She appears in the Tutorial and Volume Final.
desc.zh_cn: 琳是联邦学生会的副会长，在新手教程以及终章中出现过。

desc.en: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.jp: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.zh_cn: 桃香是基沃托斯学生会交通部的部长，在新手教程以及其他一些剧情中均有出现。个人性格很懒，喜欢逃避事情，还喜欢天天吃她的明太子味薯片。在当前设定下，桃香的主要任务就是把任务分配给老师做。

desc.en: Ayumu is a member of the General Student Council.
desc.jp: Ayumu is a member of the General Student Council.
desc.zh_cn: 步是联邦学生会的一名成员。

desc.en: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.jp: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 莉音是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。

desc.en: 琳下令啟動方舟自爆程式，並開始轉移人員。莉音指出爆炸將可能波及生命守護者號，使其最後一起爆炸。亞子在爆炸中被瓦片擊中，佳世子及時救出。
desc.jp: 琳下令啟動方舟自爆程式，並開始轉移人員。莉音指出爆炸將可能波及生命守護者號，使其最後一起爆炸。亞子在爆炸中被瓦片擊中，佳世子及時救出。
desc.zh_cn: {cf琳}下令启动方舟自爆程序，并开始转移人员。{cf莉音}指出爆炸将可能波及生命守护者号，使其最后一起爆炸。{cf亚子}在爆炸中被瓦片击中，{cf佳世子}及时救出。

desc.zh_cn_cn: 莉音是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。

desc.en: 根據安排，亞子、佳世子先行撤離，琳則表示要儘可能協助老師，因而自己將最後撤離。桃香、步隨後撤離。在走之前，陽葵向琳表示，自己已經將“光之劍”——也就是愛麗絲所製造的方舟，與生命守護者號相連線，以備不時之需。陽葵、花子之後撤離。優香在將遊戲開發部託付給綾音之後撤離。最後，綾音和琳共同支援老師。
desc.jp: 根據安排，亞子、佳世子先行撤離，琳則表示要儘可能協助老師，因而自己將最後撤離。桃香、步隨後撤離。在走之前，陽葵向琳表示，自己已經將“光之劍”——也就是愛麗絲所製造的方舟，與生命守護者號相連線，以備不時之需。陽葵、花子之後撤離。優香在將遊戲開發部託付給綾音之後撤離。最後，綾音和琳共同支援老師。
desc.zh_cn: 根据安排，{cf亚子}、{cf佳世子}先行撤离，{cf琳}则表示要尽可能协助老师，因而自己将最后撤离。{cf桃香}、{cf步}随后撤离。在走之前，{cf阳葵}向{cf琳}表示，自己已经将“光之剑”——也就是{cf爱丽丝}所制造的方舟，与生命守护者号相连接，以备不时之需。{cf阳葵}、{cf花子}之后撤离。{cf优香}在将{cn游戏开发部}托付给{cf绫音}之后撤离。最后，{cf绫音}和{cf琳}共同支援老师。

desc.en: Fuuka says that eating only sweets on Valentine's Day isn't healthy, so she prepares a packed lunch. Sensei enjoys some hot chocolate after the meal and points out that the two of them have matching mugs, causing a bashful Fuuka to run away.
desc.jp: Fuuka says that eating only sweets on Valentine's Day isn't healthy, so she prepares a packed lunch. Sensei enjoys some hot chocolate after the meal and points out that the two of them have matching mugs, causing a bashful Fuuka to run away.
desc.zh_cn: 因为认为情人节一整天只吃甜食有害健康，因此{cf风华}特地为老师准备了便当。用完餐后，喝着热可可的老师忽然提到他们手上的马克杯设计很像，让害羞得不知该如何是好的{cf风华}立即转身逃跑。

hobby.en: Cooking homestyle dishes, packing bento lunches

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.jp: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 莉音是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。

long.jp: ミレニアムサイエンススクール

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.jp:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.zh_cn:
蔚蓝档案OST的第十七首曲子，常在“商店”页播放，也是优香回忆大厅的主题曲。
曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。
